br.a: Chester School Mobile App - Click Here

div.p: Chester Area School is a quality preschool through twelfth grade facility nestled in a setting of green grass, elegant trees and golden crops. Experienced teachers and community pride are the perfect combination to provide the nurturing educational experience we offer.

div.br:
102 2nd Avenue, PO Box 159, Chester, SD 57016
High School: 605-489-2411
Elementary School: 605-489-2412
Fax: 605-489-2413
Chester Area School serves the communities of Chester, Wentworth and Franklin.
